channel.title: Deathscape v2.0 Client&source
channel.description:
Deathscape: Version 2.0
This version contains nothing near what I aim to create, it is still under majour development. I'm releasing this version now because I see that a lot of people are downloading my V1.05 server, which contains loads of bugs and flaws. Most of all, this is a base for you to use; it's not a server that you can just change stuff and run as an official server or whatever.
Note: The client doesn't contain the cache - The cache will automatically download once you start the client..
Server Download: http://uppit.com/9iynneqlmhy2/Deathscape_v2.0.rar Client Download: http://uppit.com/mxruxyzsnlyj/Deathscape_Client_v2.0.rar
Features
Client
Simple packaging. Some newer animations added. These include vengeance, rune defender blocking animation, karils X bow attack animation, the newer whip animation, and several others. Fully working client updating. You can change the links for the online version files/client downloads, or you can keep them the same so you can update the client whenever I update it. Fully working cache downloading; all you need to do is change the link to the cache file download. 459 Equipment interface and Prayer interfaces. New client background, title box and login button. Cache size has been reduced by around 4mb. Music is enabled via the client - All you need to do is send the ID's via the server and it will play. The Runescape theme song plays automatically upon start-up. Scroll down for information on disabling it. All items in the client are exact to runescape's ID's.
Server
Fully working clipped following. Most of the work is done via the client. Perfect melee combat with following, attack/defence bonuses, perfect max hit formula, and special attacks. Skulling isn't created in this version. Ranging combat has been begun on, it's not fully functional yet though. Perfect dialogue system - All you need to do is add your dialogue values/data into the 2 dimensional array in the Dialogue class and it will work. (You will also need to add the dialogue continuation in the DialoguePacket class). Perfectly working prayer. Not all prayer effects are created yet, though all melee prayers (Attack/defence/strength boosting & protection prayers). Exact prayer draining formula - Prayer drains exactly the same as Runescape. Major NPC Updating bug fixed. Perfect special bar sending/updating. It only shows when you are using a weapon that does/should have a special attack. Run energy gaining and draining works. Special attack power gaining is exact to runescape (10 every 30 seconds). Special attack amount doesn't save to the character file yet though. Clothes types now save and load to/from your character file. The character changing screen works fully also. All emotes on the emote interface work.
Media
Fully working Prayer with perfect draining, headicons and switching
Clipped Following
Whip
Dragon dagger special attack
Dragon longsword special attack
Dragon Mace special attack
Equipment Screen
Perfect equipment removing when wielding a shield/2h weapon
P.s. ill be adding pictures soon as possible, as my computer atm is not letting me upload any photos it might be an internet issue im not sure ill see what i can do.

item.title: Deathscape v2.0 Client&source
item.dc:creator: @death_ownerscape death ownerscape
item.description:
@death_ownerscape wrote:

Deathscape: Version 2.0

This version contains nothing near what I aim to create, it is still under majour development. I’m releasing this version now because I see that a lot of people are downloading my V1.05 server, which contains loads of bugs and flaws. Most of all, this is a base for you to use; it’s not a server that you can just change stuff and run as an official server or whatever.

Note: The client doesn’t contain the cache - The cache will automatically download once you start the client…

Server Download: http://uppit.com/9iynneqlmhy2/Deathscape_v2.0.rar
Client Download: http://uppit.com/mxruxyzsnlyj/Deathscape_Client_v2.0.rar

Features

Client

Simple packaging.
Some newer animations added. These include vengeance, rune defender blocking animation, karils X bow attack animation, the newer whip animation, and several others.
Fully working client updating. You can change the links for the online version files/client downloads, or you can keep them the same so you can update the client whenever I update it.
Fully working cache downloading; all you need to do is change the link to the cache file download.
459 Equipment interface and Prayer interfaces.
New client background, title box and login button.
Cache size has been reduced by around 4mb.
Music is enabled via the client - All you need to do is send the ID’s via the server and it will play.
The Runescape theme song plays automatically upon start-up. Scroll down for information on disabling it.
All items in the client are exact to runescape’s ID’s.

Server

Fully working clipped following. Most of the work is done via the client.
Perfect melee combat with following, attack/defence bonuses, perfect max hit formula, and special attacks. Skulling isn’t created in this version.
Ranging combat has been begun on, it’s not fully functional yet though.
Perfect dialogue system - All you need to do is add your dialogue values/data into the 2 dimensional array in the Dialogue class and it will work. (You will also need to add the dialogue continuation in the DialoguePacket class).
Perfectly working prayer. Not all prayer effects are created yet, though all melee prayers (Attack/defence/strength boosting & protection prayers).
Exact prayer draining formula - Prayer drains exactly the same as Runescape.
Major NPC Updating bug fixed.
Perfect special bar sending/updating. It only shows when you are using a weapon that does/should have a special attack.
Run energy gaining and draining works.
Special attack power gaining is exact to runescape (10 every 30 seconds). Special attack amount doesn’t save to the character file yet though.
Clothes types now save and load to/from your character file. The character changing screen works fully also.
All emotes on the emote interface work.

Media

Fully working Prayer with perfect draining, headicons and switching

Clipped Following

Whip

Dragon dagger special attack

Dragon longsword special attack

Dragon Mace special attack

Equipment Screen

Perfect equipment removing when wielding a shield/2h weapon

P.s. ill be adding pictures soon as possible, as my computer atm is not letting me upload any photos it might be an internet issue im not sure ill see what i can do.
